changeSet.id: update-action-config-set versions to semantic versioning for version 1
changeSet.author: system
changeSet.sql: UPDATE actions_config SET version = '1.0.0' WHERE version = '1';

changeSet.id: update-action-config-set versions to semantic versioning for version 2
changeSet.author: system
changeSet.sql: UPDATE actions_config SET version = '2.0.0' WHERE version = '2';
